English.intro: Based out of Corpus Christi, Texas, Priscilla Abrego recently joined HelmsBriscoe and brings great enthusiasm and confidence to her team...
English.background: Priscilla attended Texas A&M University where she received a Bachelor of Science Degree in Management and Marketing...

Spanish.intro: Basada en Corpus Christi, Texas, Priscilla Abrego se unió recientemente a HelmsBriscoe...
Spanish.background: Priscilla asistió a la Universidad Texas A&M donde recibió una Licenciatura en Ciencias...
